name: resole
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to repair shoes by replacing the old soles (= the bottom parts that touch the ground) with new ones: I'm having my old winter boots resoled and repolished. It's not worth getting climbing shoes re-soled; throw them away and get a new pair.
More examplesFewer examplesThese shoes have been resoled so many times that I've probably paid five times as much in repairs as I did when I bought them. Women's shoes generally can't be resoled as many times as men's.There is no limit to how often a shoe can be resoled or repaired, provided it retains support from the upper and midsole.
